Option.Name: Nearby enemy origin. If no enemies, targets bullet origin.

sfxIdBullet.Wiki: Visual effect ID for bullet projectile.

sfxIdHit.Wiki: Visual effect ID for bullet impact.

sfxIdFlick.Wiki: Visual effect ID for bullet flick. Normally triggered by guarding.

life.Wiki: Maximum time before bullet will disappear on its own. -1 means it will last indefinitely.

dist.Wiki: Distance at which attenuation of the projectile begins.

shootInterval.Wiki: Time between emitted bullets. Does nothing for bullets that only shoot once.

gravityOutRange.Wiki: Downward acceleration of bullet after it passes the attenuation distance.

homingStopRange.Wiki: Bullet will stop homing if it is within this distance of its homing target.

accelInRange.Wiki: Forward acceleration acting on bullet before it reaches the attenuation distance. Negative values will slow the bullet down.

accelOutRange.Wiki: Forward acceleration acting on bullet after it passes the attenuation distance. Negative values will slow the bullet down.

maxVellocity.Wiki: Maximum speed of bullet, regardless of acceleration.

minVellocity.Wiki: Minimum speed of bullet, regardless of acceleration.

accelTime.Wiki: Time that acceleration is active after bullet creation.

homingBeginDist.Wiki: Distance from owner at which the bullet starts homing in on targets.

hitRadius.Wiki: Initial hit radius of bullet projectile.

hitRadiusMax.Wiki: Final hit radius of bullet projectile. Set to -1 if radius does not change, which is always coupled with a value of 0 for RadiusIncreaseDuration.

spreadTime.Wiki: Time taken by bullet to transition from initial to final hit radius. Value of 0 are always coupled with values of -1 for RadiusIncreaseDuration.

homingOffsetRange.Wiki: Offset homing position by this amount.

dmgHitRecordLifeTime.Wiki: Duration of bullet impact hitbox. A value of zero means it is disabled immediately after first impact.

spEffectIdForShooter.Wiki: Special effect applied to owner when bullet is created.

autoSearchNpcThinkId.Wiki: AI parameter ID for triggered floating bullets.

hitBulletId.Wiki: Bullet emitted on impact of this bullet.

spEffectId0.Wiki: Special effect applied to target hit by bullet.

spEffectId1.Wiki: Special effect applied to target hit by bullet.

spEffectId2.Wiki: Special effect applied to target hit by bullet.

spEffectId3.Wiki: Special effect applied to target hit by bullet.

spEffectId4.Wiki: Special effect applied to target hit by bullet.

numShoot.Wiki: Number of bullets emitted at once.

homingAngle.Wiki: Turning angle of homing bullet per second.

shootAngle.Wiki: Specify how many times the missile is fired forward.

shootAngleInterval.Wiki: When firing multiple missiles, specify how often to fire them. (Y-axis)

shootAngleXInterval.Wiki: When firing multiple missiles, specify how often to fire them. (X-axis)

damageDamp.Wiki: Percentage reduction in physical damage per second.

magicDamageDamp.Wiki: Percentage reduction in magic damage per second.

fireDamageDamp.Wiki: Percentage reduction in fire damage per second.

thunderDamageDamp.Wiki: Percentage reduction in lightning damage per second.

staminaDamp.Wiki: Percentage reduction in stamina damage per second.

knockbackDamp.Wiki: Percentage reduction in knockback power per second.

shootAngleXZ.Wiki: Additional elevation angle from the horizontal.

isPenetrate.Wiki: Bullet will go through objects, players, and NPCs.

prevVellocityDirRate.Wiki: Ratio of adding the previous moving direction to the current direction when a sliding bullet hits the wall.

Material_AttackType.Wiki: Determines visual effects of bullet hit.

Material_AttackMaterial.Wiki: Sound and visual effects on hit.

launchConditionType.Wiki: Condition for determining if a new bullet will be generated when this bullet lands or expires.

FollowType.Wiki: Follow-up type. Do not follow is the default.

EmittePosType.Wiki: Source type. Usually from Damipoli. (Introduced to judge meteo)

IsAttackSfx.Wiki: Set whether bullets such as arrows will remain stuck in the character

IsPenetrateMap.Wiki: If it is ON, it will penetrate without landing when hitting a hit / static asset.

IsHitBothTeam.Wiki: Are you an enemy or an ally? (Not a wandering ghost)

IsUseShardHitList.Wiki: Specify whether to share the hit list

IsUseMultiDmyPolyIfPlace.AltName: Use Multiple Dummy Polys for Placement
IsUseMultiDmyPolyIfPlace.Wiki: Do you use the same Damipoly ID more than once when placing bullets?

attachEffectType0.AltName: Force Erase Bullet A if Hit by Other Bullet
attachEffectType0.Wiki: Does it hit other bullets forced erasure A?

attachEffectType1.AltName: Force Erase Bullet B if Hit by Other Bullet
attachEffectType1.Wiki: Does it hit the other bullet forced erasure B?

IsHitForceMagic.Wiki: If true, this bullet will be deflected by bullets like Force.

IsIgnoreSfxIfHitWater.AltName: Is SFX Ignored On Water Hit
IsIgnoreSfxIfHitWater.Wiki: If true, hit FX are not produced if the bullet impacts water.

IsIgnoreMoveStateIfHitWater.AltName: Is Move State Ignored On Water Hit
IsIgnoreMoveStateIfHitWater.Wiki: Should I ignore the effect if it hits the surface of the water?

IsHitDarkForceMagic.AltName: Can be Deflected by Bullet Deflection
IsHitDarkForceMagic.Wiki: If true, this bullet will be deflected by bullets like Spell Parry.

IsInheritEffectToChild.AltName: Is Effect Inherited by Child Bullet
IsInheritEffectToChild.Wiki: Take over the effect to replace the submunition. Ignore the speed set for the submunition

IsInheritSpeedToChild.AltName: Is Speed Inherited by Child Bullet
IsInheritSpeedToChild.Wiki: Take over the speed of the timing to replace the submunition. Ignore the speed set for the submunition

isEnableAutoHoming.Wiki: Whether to automatically follow when not locked on

isSyncBulletCulcDumypolyPos.AltName: Is Emitter Source Synced with Bullet
isSyncBulletCulcDumypolyPos.Wiki: In the case of a synchronously generated bullet, the emitter attitude at the time of synchronization is used without recalculating the attitude due to the Damipoli position when the bullet is generated.

isOwnerOverrideInitAngle.AltName: Is Direction Inherited by Child Bullet
isOwnerOverrideInitAngle.Wiki: Only valid for sub-bullets. If it is ON, the reference direction is the owner.

isInheritSfxToChild.AltName: Is SFX Inherited by Child Bullet
isInheritSfxToChild.Wiki: Take over the SFX of the parent bullet. Ignore the SFX ID set for the sub bullet

bulletSfxDeleteType_byHit.AltName: Bullet SFX Delete Type - By Hit
bulletSfxDeleteType_byHit.Wiki: Bullet SFX extinction type when landing or playing

bulletSfxDeleteType_byLifeDead.AltName: Bullet SFX Delete Type - By Expiration
bulletSfxDeleteType_byLifeDead.Wiki: Bullet SFX extinction type at the end of life

targetYOffsetRange.Wiki: Vertical offset of landing position. Shift the target position up and down at the time of launch and during homing. (-N ~ n)

shootAngleYMaxRandom.Wiki: Upper limit of random number of firing angle (0 to 360)

shootAngleXMaxRandom.Wiki: Upper limit of firing elevation random number (0 to 360)

intervalCreateBulletId.Wiki: Bullet ID used when making bullets at regular intervals

intervalCreateTimeMin.Wiki: Minimum interval for making bullets at regular intervals (0 to n)

intervalCreateTimeMax.Wiki: Maximum interval for making bullets at regular intervals (function is disabled if 0 to n 0)

predictionShootObserveTime.Wiki: Average speed observation time of predicted shooting function (function is invalid if 0 to 40)

intervalCreateWaitTime.Wiki: Waiting time to start making bullets at regular intervals

createLimitGroupId.Wiki: If it is 0, it is unused. If the upper limit is reached when creating a bullet set in the same group Id, that bullet will not be created. (Bullets created synchronously on the network will be released regardless)

isInheritSpeedToChild.AltName: Is Speed Inherited by Child Bullet
isInheritSpeedToChild.Wiki: Take over the speed of the timing to replace the submunition. Ignore the speed set for the submunition

isDisableHitSfx_byChrAndObj.AltName: Is SFX Disabled on Chr/Object Hit
isDisableHitSfx_byChrAndObj.Wiki: When ON, the bullet parameter landing SFX does not play even if it hits a character / object.

isCheckWall_byCenterRay.AltName: Is Wall Checked by Center Ray
isCheckWall_byCenterRay.Wiki: There was a problem with the digging judgment when firing a bullet, so it is for error handling. SEQ23101 [Own character] If you use a soul short arrow or a strong soul short arrow in close contact with a character with a high lock-on position, the direction of the bullet will be reversed.

isUseBulletWallFilter.Wiki: Do you use primitive magic Atari? It will change to a filter that corresponds to the Atari dedicated to primitive magic.

isNonDependenceMagicForFunnleNum.AltName: Is Follow Bullet Count not scaled by INT
isNonDependenceMagicForFunnleNum.Wiki: The number of funnels on the PC does not fluctuate by force. Become the number of shots

isAiInterruptShootNoDamageBullet.Wiki: Does it react to AI bullets (even with 0 attack power)?

randomCreateRadius.Wiki: The range of bullets used when the source type is set to occur at random locations.

assetNo_Hit.Wiki: The number of the asset to be generated at the time of landing. -1: Do not generate.

lifeRandomRange.Wiki: Add a random number of seconds with a set time fluctuation range to the lifetime [s].

homingAngleX.Wiki: Only the X-axis component of the inductive performance is changed. Do not change with -1

externalForce.Wiki: External force applied in the direction of shooting. (Y-axis is removed)

lockShootLimitAng.Wiki: Limit angle when facing the lock direction
